name: Anime Artist 3: Harem
description:
"You thought becoming an Anime Artist was so easy?"
"Not even close! But this time, our girls are here to help!"

Anime Artist 3 combines the best features from our previous games! The best possible package featuring 4 lovely fully voiced and animated heroines.

They will assist you every step of the way providing cuteness and encouragement!




- Complete each level, draw and color artworks in order to collect tons of stars!
20+ artworks crafted by our artist Bicio (winner of the "2015 Latin American Manga contest).



- Use your stars to unlock different type of dresses and hair styles for each girl. Personalize them as you wish afterwards!
Our game also offers 40+ dresses and hair styles combined!




- A complete gallery to collect all your precious works as a special reward from our girls.
Everything there, well organized. Such good memories!

Other features:

- Feel like a real artist! Draw artworks by connecting dots and color them yourself like a Pro Artist!
- Fully animated and professionally voice acted, complete with a unique character lip-syncing system
- Customize Tanita, Biscuit, Howp and Danya's appearance with unlockable outfits and hairstyles!
- Collect 16 stunning CG photos!
